item.title: How to Add API Key Access Method for Spring Projects
item.author: Author
item.description: Most technical SaaS platforms provide APIs for developers or to support clients and SDKs, and our company is no exception. Although saving OAuth2 tokens in browsers is convenient, tokens have expiration times and are issued by third parties, which can be a potential risk for clients and SDKs. Often, issues with third-party authentication services cause users to be unable to log in. Therefore, providing API Key access has become a better choice.

item.title: Adding Ambient Light Brightness Adjustment to External Monitors
item.author: An Li
item.description: macOS automatically adjusts the brightness of its built-in display according to the ambient light, but if you have an external monitor, its brightness will not be adjusted accordingly. As a result, the brightness difference between the two screens will become more noticeable as you work from day to night.
